ComicInfo.Summary:
With Katie near death and her comic shop in ruins from the latest Glarkian space vampire invasion, it’s up to The Intergalactic League of Vampblades to save the day!!
Features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant – including one by Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young (a) & Sean Callahan (c) | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young (a) & Sean Callahan (c) | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Jason Federhenn (a) & Arnaldo Robles (c) | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Jason Federhenn (a) & Arnaldo Robles (c) | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 6 | *Notes* Overall issue #24. The digital edition (1/31/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/vampblade-season-2-11-world-war-detroit-part-three/4000-656537/
ComicInfo.Title: World War Detroit Part Three
